concept.title: Disabling data collection
concept.shortdesc: This section describes the procedures for disabling data collection in the DataPower environment.

conbody.p: To unconfigure the Data PowerÂ® data collector, you must stop the data collector before disabling it. For more information about stopping the data collector, see Starting and stopping the data collector.You do not have to stop the data collector first if you are making configuration changes.
